mapper.select: select etp.training_program_name, etr.training_time, etr.trainees_num, etp.training_program_code, etp.remark from emergency_training_record etr left join emergency_training_program etp on etr.emergency_training_program_id = etp.id where etr.emergency_team_id = #{id} and etr.del_flag = 0
